title: I have a question about S ranks in blind pick
body:
Hello, 

recently i was queued for blind pick with 2 friends and one of them ended up getting an s rank resulting in me receiving a hextech chest. This confuses me because the next day (today) i queued by myself, my teammate got an s, but i didn't get a hextech chest. How exactly does the chest/key system work? Do you have to be queued with the person that got an s to get a chest even though you didn't get an s that game?

replies.body: You also need to own the champ you are playing.

You do need to be in a premade with someone who gets an S in order to get a chest for it. Also, keep in mind that you can only get [**one chest per champion each season**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/207884233).
